ops.description: Bank[6][7] = getLastFieldMapId(); // wm does not count

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:2}); // “I'll go and let the Don know
you're here. Wait here.
Don't wander around…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:10}); // {Tifa}
“Hey, don't you even care about how I am?
….nevermind, let's go!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:11}); // {Tifa}
“Of course!
If you take me lightly,
you're gonna pay for it!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:3}); // “The Don's waiting in his room…
Ha ha ha…”

ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:4}); // {Aeris}
“Now's our chance.
Let's find {Tifa}.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:5}); // {Aeris}
“I wonder
where she is?”
Bank[6][7] = getLastFieldMapId(); // wm does not count

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:7}); // Office of
Don Corneo
Keep Out!

dialogStrings:
“I'll go and let the Don know
you're here. Wait here.
Don't wander around…”

“The Don's waiting in his room…
Ha ha ha…”

{Tifa}
“Hey, don't you even care about how I am?
….nevermind, let's go!”

{Tifa}
“Of course!
If you take me lightly,
you're gonna pay for it!!”
